Sinopse: In 1996 a young rebellious DJ tries to make her way to the U.S. She does everything in her power to get out of her motherland but the whole thing goes out on rails when she makes a typo in her Visa application. She tries to correct this mistake by going to the small dysfunctional town of Chrystal. The dysfunctionality in the town challenges her life and mentality she didn't quite believe were possible.
